variable.tooltip: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)
variable.label: Advanced Consist Address
variable.tooltip: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)
This loco runs Normal(default) or Reversed(address+128) when in the consist
variable.label: Locomotive Direction In Consist
variable.tooltip: This loco runs Normal(default) or Reversed(address+128) when in the consist
'2' bit. Sets the Speed Step for motor, also may affect some light settings
variable.label: Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: Sets the Speed Step for motor, also may affect some light settings
Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward
variable.label: Locomotive Direction
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward
'NMRA Digital only: Digital Operation Only - DC conversion enabled: both Digital + Analog, default is Off
variable.label: Power Source Conversion
variable.tooltip:
NMRA Digital only: Digital Operation Only.
DC conversion enabled: both Digital + Analog, default is both

variable.label: Save Delay
variable.tooltip: Time in seconds, allows decoder to detect packet loss. Only works if Keep Alive installed.

factReset.label: Restore All CVs to Factory Defaults.

label.text: If placed in a consist (address > 0), decoder will only respond to the consist address except for Programming
